START:
Hi there!
I am the Linden Woods Community Centre bot! I provide you with information about the centre!
What would you like to inquire about?%[Centre Hours](postback:hrs) %[Location](postback:location) %[Calendar](postback:cal) %[Contact](postback:contact)
CENTRE HOURS:
The centre is open on Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM and on Saturday and Sunday from 12:00 PM to 6:00 PM!
Type "more" if you want to talk about something else.
LOCATION:
We are located on 414 Lindenwood Dr W, Winnipeg, MB R3P 2K5!
Type "more" if you want to talk about something else.
CALENDAR: Are you interested in viewing events or making rental requsts? %[View Events](postback:events) %[Rental Request](postback:rent)
VIEW EVENTS:
Visit the calendar to view events! %[Open Calendar](https://teamup.com/ksda5c5ab6d3db66c7/)
Type "more" if you want to talk about something else.
RENTAL REQUEST:
Here is how you can make a rental request. %[Open Calendar](https://teamup.com/ksda5c5ab6d3db66c7/)
1. Choose an open time in the calendar where you would like to request a booking. 2. Click to open a dialogue box and from here, you need to enter a title and time for your request. 3. In the "Calendar" slot you need to choose between a Gym or MPR request. 4. Finally, press the "More" button and enter your contact info
(Name, phone, and e-mail), and if you have any additional requests or questions, you can enter them here.
Type "more" if you want to talk about something else.
CONTACT:
You can send us an message here.%[Email Manager](http://www.lindenwoodscc.com/contact.html)
Type "more" if you want to talk about something else.
ASK BASIC QUESTIONS:
You can ask basic questions and I will try my best to answer them. For example: "When is the next open gym?"
For a list of all the questions you can ask me type "faq".
If you have feedback (like some questions you think I should be able to answer), simply type "bot feedback".
Type "more" if you want to talk about something else.
